vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.24;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Rachel (H7354);
brother of: Benjamin (H1144);
half-brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Issachar (H3485), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783); married to Asenath (H0621);
father of: Manasseh (H4519) and Ephraim (H0669); also called Zaphenath-paneah at Gen.41.45;
§ Joseph = "Jehovah has added"
1) the eldest son of Jacob by Rachel
2) father of Igal, who represented the tribe of Issachar among the spies
3) a son of Asaph
4) a man who took a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
5) a priest of the family of Shebaniah in the time of Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יְהוֹסֵף   hijo de Jacob; fundador de una tribu de Israel; (b)   padre de Igal; tribu de Isacar; (c)   hijo de Asaf; cantor del templo; en tiempos del rey David; (d)   varios hombres
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約瑟 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "耶和華已增添"
1) 雅各藉拉結所生的長子
2) 以迦的父親, 代表以薩迦支派的探子(民 13:7)
3) 亞薩的兒子(代上 25:2,9)
4) 以斯拉時代一名娶外邦人為妻的人(拉 10:42)
5) 尼希米時代示巴尼族的一位祭司(尼 12:14)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约瑟 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "耶和华已增添"
1) 雅各藉拉结所生的长子
2) 以迦的父亲, 代表以萨迦支派的探子(民 13:7)
3) 亚萨的儿子(代上 25:2,9)
4) 以斯拉时代一名娶外邦人为妻的人(拉 10:42)
5) 尼希米时代示巴尼族的一位祭司(尼 12:14)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at Num.13.7;
father of: Igal (H3008)
§ Joseph = "Jehovah has added"
1) the eldest son of Jacob by Rachel
2) father of Igal, who represented the tribe of Issachar among the spies
3) a son of Asaph
4) a man who took a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
5) a priest of the family of Shebaniah in the time of Nehemiah

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.25.2;
son of: Asaph (H0623H);
brother of: Zaccur (H2139J), Nethaniah (H5418H) and Asharelah (H0841)
§ Joseph = "Jehovah has added"
1) the eldest son of Jacob by Rachel
2) father of Igal, who represented the tribe of Issachar among the spies
3) a son of Asaph
4) a man who took a foreign wife in the time of Ezra
5) a priest of the family of Shebaniah in the time of Nehemiah
